summary: This is an email chain from August 24, 2020, forwarding an invitation for a telephone call regarding Epstein victims. The email is from an Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking at the U.S. Department of Justice, seeking to schedule a call with a Victim/Witness Coordinator.

persons.name: Wendy
persons.context: Forwards an email invitation about Epstein victims to an unnamed recipient.

events.title: Scheduled telephone call regarding Epstein victims
events.description: A telephone call is scheduled from 3:30-4:30 p.m. between an Associate Deputy Attorney General and a Victim/Witness Coordinator to discuss Epstein victims.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice was actively coordinating with a Victim/Witness Coordinator regarding Epstein victims as of August 2020.
An Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking sought to schedule a call about Epstein victims.
The email indicates ongoing official attention to Epstein victim coordination over a year after Epstein's death.
